body_html: Hello, have you realize that with different size of input images even though output number is same, how you unify the input layer? My point is during training, if I set sess.graph.finalize(), when switch to new image training I will get error Graph is finalized and cannot be modified. How can we keep Graph consistent during training different size images.
body_text: Hello, have you realize that with different size of input  images even though output number is same, how you unify the input layer? My point is during training, if I set sess.graph.finalize(), when switch to new image training I will get error Graph is finalized and cannot be modified. How can we keep Graph consistent during training different size images.
body: Hello, have you realize that with different size of input  images even though output number is same, how you unify the input layer? My point is during training, if I set sess.graph.finalize(), when switch to new image training I will get error Graph is finalized and cannot be modified. How can we keep Graph consistent during training different size images.
